snippet: Ling Jihua, who was a close adviser to President Hu Jintao, was named head of a department that deals with unions at a time when powerful factions are forcing China’s leaders to protect their political networks.
abstract: Ling Jihua, a senior Chinese official and close adviser to President Hu Jintao, is named head of a department that deals with unions at a time when powerful factions are forcing China’s leaders to protect their political networks; experts say move to this new post is a demotion and a surprising development ahead of this year’s leadership transition .
lead_paragraph: Ling Jihua, who was a close adviser to President Hu Jintao, was named head of a department that deals with unions at a time when powerful factions are forcing China’s leaders to protect their political networks.

headline.seo: Party Intrigue Seen in Chinese Official’s Apparent Demotion
headline.main: Party Intrigue Seen in China as Official Is Demoted
